title: Rajputana Polki and Tanzanite Jhumkaalu
features: Elaborate floral-inspired Polki setting with a central oval green stone. Intricate Tanzanite detailing in a tear-drop shape surrounded by polki accents. Finished with a cascade of lustrous pearl drops. Handcrafted by artisans with generations of expertise.
occasions: or special celebrations. Perfect for adding a touch of heritage elegance to your ensemble. Suitable for traditional attire like sarees
description: This exquisite pair of Jhumkaalu showcases the timeless allure of Polki diamonds combined with the unique hue of Tanzanite. The Hyderabadi gold polish adds a rich, warm tone. Each Polki diamond is carefully selected and set by hand, ensuring exceptional brilliance. The pearl drops add a touch of graceful movement and femininity.
